settings.title: Now anyone can roti!
settings.text: Join the crowd! Check out what users have to say about the Rotimatic here.

A potential game changer
for roti-loving households

Long wait, but Rotimatic‚Äôs
a hit with everyone.

Best thing since sliced read.
A roti making machine

8 years of stubborness to give
birth to their Roti making robot

settings.title: Light on your body‚Ä¶ and on your wallet
settings.text: Calculate how much you can save with Rotimatic by reducing processed rotis, eating out and takeaways.
settings.save_text: That‚Äôs a lot to be spending on frozen rotis. Now you‚Äôve saved enough for a little treat. A day out at the spa? A round of golf? Gift for the kids? Treat yourself!

settings.main-heading: Never stops learning. Smarter with every use
settings.content-never: Powered with Artificial Intelligence and IoT capabilities, Rotimatic keeps getting better with data from every flatbread made. Once connected to WiFi, it upgrades itself with the latest software updates and provides remote troubleshooting capabilities. Rotimatic gets smarter over time and empowers you to do more and get creative.

settings.quote: Life is now really sorted wirh Rotimatic. Even here, far from home I do not miss my home food that much thanks to Rotimatic. Also its healthy. Kudos to the team for a good job!
settings.author: Fernandes

settings.quote: The option of making tortillas or rotis in a household that enjoys both Mexican and Indian cuisines using the same device is something I never expected to come across! Ever since we‚Äôve been using Rotimatic.
settings.author: Parera

settings.quote: Rotimatic replaces the need to get my hands dirty in the process of kneading and rolling the dough with automation. But more than getting my hands dirty, the automatic roti making machine ensures that contaminants are not there.
settings.author: Dwiti

settings.title: Be the first in line!
settings.text: Join our priority waitlist and be among the first to get your hands on a Rotimatic when orders open in your country

settings.question: What is the price of Rotimatic?
settings.anwser: The retail base price of Rotimatic is USD 1299, or it‚Äôs equivalent in your local currency excluding any applicable taxes which may/may not be a part of the price quoted. Shipping and delivery charges are exclusive and may vary depending upon your country location. Scroll to the¬†top of this page¬†for detailed pricing, discounts, and offers. You can also check express delivery options.

settings.question: Who is using it right now?
settings.anwser:
Thousands of proud owners make a million rotis with Rotimatic everyday!
Health-conscious homes, fussy kids, time-starved couples,¬†foodies, techies, roti-lovers, progressive families and many more. From time to health to convenience to wonder, everyone loves Rotimatic for a different reason.¬†Take a look¬†here

settings.question: What makes Rotimatic a ‚Äòsmart machine‚Äô?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic has brought Iot to kitchen tops. Once connected to WiFi, Rotimatic gets smarter with every roti. Masala rotis, pooris, tortillas, pizzas, Rotimatic will allow you to relish a different type of bread every day, all via remote upgrades. The video chat feature on the app, takes the customer support experience to the next level.¬†What‚Äôs more? In a matter of time, you will be able to control Rotimatic remotely via the mobile App.¬†

settings.question: Is it as easy to use as they say?
settings.anwser: You bet. Ease of use is at the core of Rotimatic, it‚Äôs designed to be simple and intuitive. Once your ingredients are ready, you can make roti with just one touch. Cleaning-up after is also super easy with two removable, dish-washer-friendly parts.

settings.question: Can I see Rotimatic in action?
settings.anwser:
Yes you can. Join one of our weekly virtual demo sessions by clicking on the link¬†here. See how Rotimatic churns out rotis in minutes and get all your questions answered.

Alternatively, you can also try Rotimatic in the comfort of your home risk-free with our 30-day money back guarantee. If you are not happy with your experience, we will refund you the product price after deducting the return shipping price of U$199. However, we assure you, you will fall in love with it the very first time you get your hands on it.

settings.question: How good are the rotis?
settings.anwser:
There‚Äôs nothing quite like¬†Mummy ke haath ka khana¬†aka¬†mom-made food, right? Our users say that Rotimatic rotis come very close. Because every roti is guaranteed to puff. Discerning mothers and grandmothers themselves nod in approval when they see each roti puff evenly in Rotimatic and are delightfully surprised by the softness and its taste.

Every Rotimatic roti is round, evenly cooked, and puffed with 3 separate layers. Since all the ingredients that go in Rotimatic are chosen by you, the taste and nutrition is as per your preference.

settings.question: What more can I make besides, roti?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic is designed as a platform to make any type of flatbread. With remote upgrades, it will enable you to make puris, masala rotis, pizzas and tortillas.

settings.question: Do I really get 24 X 7 support?
settings.anwser:
Absolutely. Being a smart machine, Rotimatic offers seamless and advanced customer support.¬†

Chat support will be available 24/7 via the Rotimatic App. We can remotely connect to your machine to troubleshoot and send software fixes via the cloud. Within the warranty period, if you face any hardware problems, we shall either repair or replace your unit free of charge, to ensure you don‚Äôt miss the hot, fresh rotis.

settings.question: Can I buy Rotimatic from any country?
settings.anwser: Not yet. Rotimatic is currently available for retail purchase only in the following regions: Singapore, USA, Canada, New Zealand, Australia, UK, Germany, France, Netherlands, Ireland, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Hong Kong, UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar , Oman , Kuwait and Bahrain. The shipping and delivery cost of Rotimatic may change as per your location

settings.question: Does the warranty cover everything?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic comes with a 1-year free warranty valid in the country that the Rotimatic is shipped to. You also enjoy Rotimatic Care for longer if you take an extended warranty on your unit,¬†details here.

settings.question: What if I change my mind and want to cancel my order?
settings.anwser:
We‚Äôll be sad, but we‚Äôll understand. You‚Äôre free to cancel the order before the unit reaches you for any reason, and get a full refund.
Rotimatic also comes with a 30-day money back guarantee.So after you receive your Rotimatic, if you are unhappy with your Rotimatic experience, you can return it within 30 days and we‚Äôll refund the retail price of the product after deducting the return shipping price of U$199

settings.question: Can I buy Rotimatic from other websites?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic is available for purchase only on the¬†official Rotimatic website.Currently, we do not encourage you to buy Rotimatic from other e-commerce websites.

settings.question: Can I order Rotimatic and ship it overseas?
settings.anwser: We do not encourage you to ship Rotimatic overseas. The warranty on Rotimatic is applicable only in the country it‚Äôs delivered. The voltage of Rotimatic shipped to you will be as per the country it‚Äôs delivered in (110 V for US, Canada and 220V for Europe, SG and AU)

settings.title: Remote troubleshooting
settings.text: Wifi connectivity allows swift troubleshooting of software issues via Cloud by experts, almost instantly, at the comfort of your home.

settings.title: Service at your door step
settings.text: Free pickup and delivery. Never an extra dollar for shipping, labour or any advanced support.

settings.title: We are here for you
settings.text: Get 24/7 access to our tech support experts via Live chat on the Rotimatic App or speak to our experts with a call back request.

settings.title: Here‚Äôs what Rotimatic owners have to share

settings.content-speed: From dry flour to freshly puffed flatbread in a minute. This is possible with a 32-bit microprocessor that harmoniously orchestrates 10 motors, 15 sensors and 300 parts in parallel. The 10 motors work together based on the data from 15 different sensors, which measure things like temperature, position and the most complex and important metric, that is, consistency. It manages all processes seamlessly to save every second possible.
